title: Bankruptcy Auction of 1970 Chevrolet Chevelle Malibu V8
item_description:
Bankruptcy Auction of 1970 Chevrolet Chevelle Malibu V8

Specifications

  • Year: 1970
  • Make: Chevrolet
  • Model: Malibu
  • VIN: 136370R206003
  • License: 3EWS749
    • Registration Expiration: 5/14/2017
    • Planned Non-Op
  • Odometer Reads: 46,352.8 (not actual mileage)
    • Reason: New engine
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 3256lbs
  • Engine: Goodwrench 350 Crate Motor (Previous owner states it has approx. 10,000 miles on the motor)Â 
  • Body Style: Coupe
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: P225/70R1498M+S

Exterior

  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Cloth
  • Interior Color: Blue

Note: Certificate of Duplicate Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once 1. the court order is received and 2. the title has been signed by the bankruptcy trustee. Please allow several weeks (1-3) after the removal. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, inspections, corrections, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
